snippet: The blast ripped through the Russian-made vessel, which was docked in Mumbai on Wednesday, and left an unknown toll, with at least 18 personnel reported trapped.
abstract: Explosion tears through Indian naval submarine docked in Mumbai, India, sending part of vessel sinking to bottom of port; at least 18 naval personnel remain trapped inside.
lead_paragraph: The blast ripped through the Russian-made vessel, which was docked in Mumbai on Wednesday, and left an unknown toll, with at least 18 personnel reported trapped.

headline.main: Explosion Partly Sinks Indian Naval Submarine
headline.print_headline: Unknown Toll From Explosion of Indian Naval Submarine
